scripts.//subsetFonts: This is the manual command I use to subset the font until I can get subfont to work
scripts.subsetFonts: find ./dist -type f -name '*.html' -print0 | xargs -0 glyphhanger --subset='./public/iAWriterMonoS.woff2' --formats=woff2,woff && find ./dist -type f -name '*.html' -print0 | xargs -0 glyphhanger --subset='./public/iAWriterMonoS-Bold.woff2' --formats=woff2,woff
